name: Coffee Warz
description:
controls:

WASD or ARROWS to Move

SPACE or X or MOUSE CLICK to ATTACK

Story:

Coffee Warz takes place in an office building where a war broke out because of a shortage of coffee. Take control of the business by taking out laid off personel, janitors and electricians. Each floor gets randomly generated. You level up by killing enemies. Try to clear a floor first before going up another level because enemies getting stronger too.

Made for #CoffeeJam
